thread.title: The Beekman Hotel Brings In a Bar Czar

author: Charles Passy
title: The Beekman Hotel Brings In a Bar Czar
text:
Not long ago, lower Manhattan essentially shut down at 5 p.m. Now, it is getting a major new nightspot.
The Beekman hotel, which has established itself as one of the hotter destinations in the area since opening in 2016, is adding what it bills as a “refined post-modern lounge” to its offerings.
The hotel brought in Serge Becker, a veteran... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
